title: Zion tlang leh van arsi mawi
lyrics:
Zion tlang leh van arsi mawi,
Lalpan ka tan min siam;
Nakinah chu hmun ka thlen chuan,
Ka lawmna pangpar tur.

Hun engin emaw tunah min dal,
Thisen zara ka ta, Zion tlang;
Aw, engtik nge ka han hmuh ang,
Chhandamtu leh ram ni tla ngai lo?

Tunah buaina Jordan lui kam-
Ah ka nghak Chhandamtu;
Chu arsi piah chawlhna hmun chu,
Eng tik nge ka thlen ang?

Huna, kal rawh, Zion faten,
Ram ropui kan nghakhlel;
Ka lenna thlaler ram a nni,
Ka kalsan thuai dawn e.

Aw, Hnehtu Lal Immanuel-
A ram ka thlen hun chuan,
Hmangaihna lal puan sin vein,
Chatuanin kan leng ang.
